terms: Wanderer: Drive-0, Deception-0, Recon-0, Stealth-0, Streetwise-0, Survival-0, DEX+1, -5000 credits.  You are offered a chance to take part in a risky but rewarding adventure. Injury You'll never forget the feeling of losing a part of yourself. Choose between reducing your Strength or your Dexterity by 1 Mustering Out Benefit: New Contact: Famous Performer In this career, you were injured [DEX -1].  You sought professional medical attention.
Corporate/1: Broker-0, Advocate-1, Investigate-1, Broker-1.  You are given advanced training in a specialist field. You were promoted.

Corporate/2: Diplomat-1, Admin-1, INT+1.  You befriend a superior in the corporation or the colony. Gain an Ally. Your new Ally either ensures you have Diplomacy at 1, or puts in a good word for your next evaluation. You were promoted.
Corporate/3: Flyer-1, END+2, -5000 credits There was a mishap during this term! Injury Modified END-2. Your previous employer covers (50%) of the cost. You seek professional medical attention.
Diplomat (3rd secretary)/1: Electronics-0, Deception-1, Act-1, Admin-1, Gambler-1. Your time as a ruler or playboy gives you a wide range of experiences. Gain Streetwise-1. You were promoted.

Diplomat (2nd Secretary)/2: Carouse-1, new ally: planetary governor, Gambler-2, Science (Archaeology)-1, Gun combat (Energy)-1.  You were promoted. Mustering Out Benefit: Nontransferable, lifetime membership in the Travellerâ€™s Aid Society (TAS). Mustering Out Benefit: Ship Shares [2].
interactions: Diplomacy, holography, driving sportscars, and studying deficiencies in other societies.
Weaknesses: Prone to elitism and low empathy due to upbringing in state-run creches.  Shuns close relationships as she plans to return to Jardin and live a totally differently life when returning.

equipment.name: PERIPHERAL VISION ENHANCEMENT
equipment.traits: DM+1 to initiative and recon checks
